conbody.p: The design of the database determines what kind of data has to be stored in the field. Usually the fields in the design have already been given a name and you are using that name. Always use meaningful names. Of course you can give the field a description, but a clear name still works best.

Field names must meet the following requirements:
name must be unique within the table
name may not start with a space
name may not contain the following characters: point, exclamation mark and brackets [ and ]
